kylotto-card-flip.title: Kentucky Lottery Card Matching
kylotto-card-flip.projectDescription: A card matching game featuring a call-to-action for branded online games.

content.article: A matched game-type is selected at random from the structured data via Javascript. JavaScript then randomly distributes the branded playing cards. Users are prompted to, "Flip the cards and find a matching game!" The playing cards are animated with CSS and triggered by the game's JavaScript logic. Both the performance and size of the Javascript was carefully considered in order to serve the largest set of browsers and devices.

kylotto-speed.title: Kentucky Lottery Speedometer
kylotto-speed.projectDescription: Multiple banner advertisements featuring native JavaScript.

mainImage.caption: Need for speed.
mainImage.alt: Kentucky Lottery Speedometer accelerates to full-speed!

content.article: Each KY Lotto Speedometer banner features ultra-lightweight HTML5 and is built for specific viewport sizes. Each banner features SVG images and a lightweight project size (200KB). By leveraging Grunt, a JavaScript build tool, each banner is programmatically produced based on variables such as size and name. Each banner was eventually validated through the Sizmek Media Platform.

images.caption: This ad was built for multiple sizes, 728x90.
The ad may also be used at 300x600.

trex-deck.title: Trex: Composite Decking
trex-deck.projectDescription: Unique expandable banner advertisement utilizing an animated series of images.

mainImage.caption: A unique banner experience featuring animated sets of images.

content.article: In just under a 1.5MB project size, Trex: Composite Decking aims to emulate 3d-animation with a series of animated images. The images are then alternated using JavaScript to create keyframe animation. The sliding navigation prompts users to switch between different scenes. The banner advertisement was served and validated over the Sizmek Media Platform.

images.caption: An animation series featuring how light might damage composite decking.
This menu item show the effects of spilled wine on composite decking.
The advertisement can expand or collapse into a smaller banner.
Trex's Composite Decking is not prone to infestations like some other traditional materials.
